mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_disk(disk_category, disk_name, disk_company, disk_type, disk_volume, disk_regdate, disk_price, disk_iamge) VALUES(#{disk_category},#{disk_name},#{disk_company},#{disk_type},#{disk_volume},now(),#{disk_price},#{disk_image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM p_disk WHERE disk_status = 0) p_disk WHERE disk_category like CONCAT('%', #{category}) ORDER BY disk_type,disk_volume,disk_price
